data.message: Eminem does not run this page just so you all know that......js...... I doubt he reads any of the comments that show up on this thread and quite frankly I don't think he really cares he never plays in the US performs in the US only shows up to award ceremonies when he's begged pleaded on hands and knees and it's not because he's a lyrical God it's simply for ratings...... all his words to do is divide people and promote hatred think about it Mr. Lyrical genius........smh
